description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Schnitzel Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken salad,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Chicken,Sesame free,Summer,Peanut free
name: Chicken Schnitzel Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs creamy dressing (such as Ranch or Caesar dressing)
1 tbs parmesan, shaved (or shredded tasty cheese)

recipeInstructions.text: Pour enough oil into a large frying pan to come 5mm up side of pan. Heat over medium-high heat. Cook chicken for 3 minutes each side or until cooked through. Transfer to a plate lined with paper towel to drain. Slice.
Place salad leaves into a lunch box then pile remaining ingredients on top.
